tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ******** ***** ** *** ** **** ******* * **** ********* ****  
Doctor is so compassionate towards patient , she is highly skilled , prescribes exactly what is needed for the patient and she never asks us to take unnecessary blood tests for the kid , one time I visited on 5th day of my son’s fever , still doctor said , “ he is active and playful , we can wait for few more days, he will be alright “ . She cares for the kids , She explains about treatment thoroughly and she listens to us , *** ** *** ** *** **** ******** I strongly recommend the doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ********* *********** **** * **** *** *** ******** ** ******** ***** The doctor patiently listened to out concerns before she explained the root causes and the course of treatment. She was generous in giving enough time to clarify all our  doubts and questions during the consultation. One is immediately relived and reassured that they are in safe hands after you have spoken to her.  Extremely friendly  and competent doctor with whom you immediately make a connection and can sense her passion for the job. Highly recommend consulting Dr Anuradha for any pediatric concerns.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Anuradha is very friendly and see my kid like a family and doctor medicine is very effective and appreciate the clear explanations during each visit, making me feel informed and confident in the care my child.Dr. Anuradha  's patience and attentiveness to our questions have made a significant positive impact.

review: i have been visiting mam since few months now for my 6 months old son..A devine mother cum doctor she is .. i am so happy that I have met her in this life, very genuine humble and listens and addresses all the concerns. ****** ********* *********** **********. all her suggestions are easy to follow and easily available at home. be it anything related to my son,she is the go to person for me. highly recommended.

review: I would say more than a doctor she is so child friendly that my kids call her "anu aunty".. she is our pediatrician for more than 7yrs and that now we don't visit any other doctors for my kids. we believe that one visit to her really cures everything and so we travel to her from north Bangalore. I strongly recommend this DR for everyone.
